snippet: A string of injuries to quarterbacks the last two seasons has prompted Wisconsin Coach Bret Bielema to twice use a new N.C.A.A. rule allowing immediate transfers for players who have graduated.
abstract: A string of injuries to quarterbacks the last two seasons has prompted Wisconsin Coach Bret Bielema to twice use a new N.C.A.A. rule allowing immediate transfers for players who have graduated.

headline.main: Wisconsin Uses New N.C.A.A. Rule to Solve Quarterback Woes, Again
